summary:
Alduin finally shows how to be The World Eater
Vanilla Assets only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Alduin finally shows how to be The World Eater
Vanilla Assets only No Script


Story:

[i]And the Scrolls have foretold of black wings in the cold, That when brother's wage war
come unfurled! Alduin, Bane of Kings, ancient shadow unbound, With a
hunger to swallow the world![/i]

Alduin got tired of Dragonborn's BS so he decided to devour skyrim on New Year's Eve.
He manipulate his physical form back from the dead creating illusions of himself to destroy skyrim at single strike.
Destroy them all show him what is the last dragonborn made of.

[color=#00ff00][b][size=4]Happy New Year Everyone !!! :)[/size][/b][/color]

added NO RESPAWN version

[b][size=3][b][size=3]If you defeat them they will respawn within 10 to 30 [/size][/b][b][size=3]days [/size][/b]
just dont visit the place within [b][size=3][b][size=3]10 to 30 [/size][/b][b][size=3]days[/size][/b][/size][/b].[/size][/b]

I create this mod because I really like hard enemies, challenges and getting my dragonborn's *ss get kicked.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.
